about_the_game:
InkyPen is the best all-you-can-read subscription service for reading Manga & Comics!

The TL;DR

  • Huge library of awesome Manga & Comics from top publishers
  • Free range of comics available
  • Read unlimited comics for a low monthly subscription price

All-You-Can-Read Comics & Manga

Subscribers to InkyPen get FULL access to our range of comics available in their region. Read as much as you want, whenever you want, as long as you have an internet connection.

Free Content Available

We have a range of free comics and samples available for everyone, with more added regularly.

Hit Titles From Big Publishers

Find the best titles from major international publishers, including Manga, Western Comics, French/Belgian comics, Chinese Manhua, webtoons, comic strips and much, much more.

Game Adaptations

Amongst our comics we also have a large number of videogame and RPG adaptations, letting you dive deeper into the worlds of your favorite fantasy universes.

ext_user_account_notice: InkyPen Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with 1GB memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz

  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with 1GB memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: InkyPen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with 1GB memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: InkyPen is the all-you-can-read subscription service for Manga & Comics. Browse our content, read free samples, or subscribe to read all you want!
